unnormalised: Crop insurance, bhaiyya, is a lifesaver, no? Especially in Maharashtra! Last year, 20/07/2023, floods washed away everything. Farmer Rambhau got some relief. Is PMFBY covering more risks now? Heard some talk at the Mandi on 10/10/2023, 14:00 hrs about claims processing being faster. Hope SBI Agriculture is helping too! Need better awareness, from 01/01/2024 onwards, in villages.
normalised: Crop insurance, bhaiyya, is a lifesaver, no? Especially in Maharashtra! Last year, twentieth july two thousand and twenty three, floods washed away everything. Farmer Rambhau got some relief. Is P M F B Y covering more risks now? Heard some talk at the Mandi on tenth october two thousand and twenty three, fourteen zero zero hours about claims processing being faster. Hope S B I Agriculture is helping too! Need better awareness, from first january two thousand and twenty four onwards, in villages.
